definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

pinyin: xue4 guan3 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

sentences.english: The doctor burst a blood vessel.
sentences.chinese: 医生使一条血管破裂了。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression of MMP9 in tumor tissues was positively associated with the MVD val-ue.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤组织中MMP9的表达与微血管密度呈正相关。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价血管迷走性晕厥患者的压力反射器功能。

sentences.english: The results are published in the journal Cardiovascular Ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果公布在心血管超声波期刊上。

sentences.english: The cold constricts the blood vessels, immediately reducing puffiness.
sentences.chinese: 冷能收缩血管，立即减少浮肿。

sentences.english: The medicine works by blocking new blood-vessel growth and leakiness.
sentences.chinese: 该药通过阻断新血管形成和渗漏其治疗作用。

sentences.english: The subdermal vascular network is very important for the skin graft survival.
sentences.chinese: 带真皮下血管网对皮片成活可能起重要作用。

sentences.english: The vessels of vascular pedicles were anastomosed to the femoral artery and the branches of saphenous vein.
sentences.chinese: 皮瓣血管蒂分刖与股动脉及大隐静脉吻合。

sentences.english: Angiomyolipoma was also found in the contralateral kidney.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌脂肪瘤也发现对侧肾。

sentences.english: Operation was the most effective therapy for jaw hemangiomas.
sentences.chinese: 对颌骨血管瘤手术治疗是最有效的手段。

sentences.english: The pulmonary vasculitis and Raynaud phenomenon might be related to immunologic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 认为肺血管的病变及雷诺现象可能与免疫异常有关。

sentences.english: Both drug-eluting stents were associated with a marked reduction in target-lesion revascularization.
sentences.chinese: 两种药物涂层组靶血管病变的发生率均显著下降。

sentences.english: Cardiac catheterization with angiography is the reference standard for diagnosing CAD.
sentences.chinese: 心血管导管造影是诊断冠心病的金标准。

sentences.english: We could seetheblood vesselsinhis temple pulsate ashe became more angry.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以看到血管搏动他的庙宇，他变得更加愤怒。

sentences.english: Objective To observe and summarize the therapeutic effects of maxillofacial hemangioma in chlidren.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察和总结颌面部血管瘤的治疗效果。

sentences.english: When you have PDR , abnormal blood vessels grow in the retina.
sentences.chinese: 当你有民主共和国，异常血管生长在视网膜。

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
